DOC.brief_summary: Multicentre, Double blind, Randomized, Comparative Study(comparing N-acetyl-aspartyl-glutamic acid(NAAGA) in Abak preservative free device versus SALINE in Abak preservative free device. Evaluation of the effects and safety of NAABAK® through inflammation markers and symptoms in patients with allergic conjunctivitis and dry eye syndrome after 3 months treatment. The patients will attend 4 visits.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of the Effect and Tolerance of Preservative Free NAAGA on the Inflammatory Component and Symptoms of Dry Eye Syndrome in Allergic Conjunctivitis Patients
DOC.criteria: Age ≥ 20 years old Patients with dry eye syndrome in allergic conjunctivitis Severe dry eye syndrome Severe ocular pathology
